00070 const int32_t CSeqNo::m_iSeqNoTH = 0x3FFFFFFF;
00071 const int32_t CSeqNo::m_iMaxSeqNo = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00072 const int32_t CAckNo::m_iMaxAckSeqNo = 0x7FFFFFFF;

00081 CUDT::CUDT()
00082 {
00083    m_pSndBuffer = NULL;
00084    m_pRcvBuffer = NULL;
00085    m_pSndLossList = NULL;
00086    m_pRcvLossList = NULL;
00087    m_pACKWindow = NULL;
00088    m_pSndTimeWindow = NULL;
00089    m_pRcvTimeWindow = NULL;
00090 
00091    m_pSndQueue = NULL;
00092    m_pRcvQueue = NULL;
00093    m_pPeerAddr = NULL;
00094    m_pSNode = NULL;
00095    m_pRNode = NULL;
00096 
00097    // Initilize mutex and condition variables
00098    initSynch();
00099 
00100    // Default UDT configurations
00101    m_iMSS = 1500;
00102    m_bSynSending = true;
00103    m_bSynRecving = true;
00104    m_iFlightFlagSize = 25600;
00105    m_iSndBufSize = 8192;
00106    m_iRcvBufSize = 8192; //Rcv buffer MUST NOT be bigger than Flight Flag size
00107    m_Linger.l_onoff = 1;
00108    m_Linger.l_linger = 180;
00109    m_iUDPSndBufSize = 65536;
00110    m_iUDPRcvBufSize = m_iRcvBufSize * m_iMSS;
00111    m_iSockType = UDT_STREAM;
00112    m_iIPversion = AF_INET;
00113    m_bRendezvous = false;
00114    m_iSndTimeOut = -1;
00115    m_iRcvTimeOut = -1;
00116    m_bReuseAddr = true;
00117    m_llMaxBW = -1;
00118 
00119    m_pCCFactory = new CCCFactory<CUDTCC>;
00120    m_pCC = NULL;
00121    m_pCache = NULL;
00122 
00123    // Initial status
00124    m_bOpened = false;
00125    m_bListening = false;
00126    m_bConnected = false;
00127    m_bClosing = false;
00128    m_bShutdown = false;
00129    m_bBroken = false;
00130    m_bPeerHealth = true;
00131    m_ullLingerExpiration = 0;
00132 }

00134 CUDT::CUDT(const CUDT& ancestor)
00135 {
00136    m_pSndBuffer = NULL;
00137    m_pRcvBuffer = NULL;
00138    m_pSndLossList = NULL;
00139    m_pRcvLossList = NULL;
00140    m_pACKWindow = NULL;
00141    m_pSndTimeWindow = NULL;
00142    m_pRcvTimeWindow = NULL;
00143 
00144    m_pSndQueue = NULL;
00145    m_pRcvQueue = NULL;
00146    m_pPeerAddr = NULL;
00147    m_pSNode = NULL;
00148    m_pRNode = NULL;
00149 
00150    // Initilize mutex and condition variables
00151    initSynch();
00152 
00153    // Default UDT configurations
00154    m_iMSS = ancestor.m_iMSS;
00155    m_bSynSending = ancestor.m_bSynSending;
00156    m_bSynRecving = ancestor.m_bSynRecving;
00157    m_iFlightFlagSize = ancestor.m_iFlightFlagSize;
00158    m_iSndBufSize = ancestor.m_iSndBufSize;
00159    m_iRcvBufSize = ancestor.m_iRcvBufSize;
00160    m_Linger = ancestor.m_Linger;
00161    m_iUDPSndBufSize = ancestor.m_iUDPSndBufSize;
00162    m_iUDPRcvBufSize = ancestor.m_iUDPRcvBufSize;
00163    m_iSockType = ancestor.m_iSockType;
00164    m_iIPversion = ancestor.m_iIPversion;
00165    m_bRendezvous = ancestor.m_bRendezvous;
00166    m_iSndTimeOut = ancestor.m_iSndTimeOut;
00167    m_iRcvTimeOut = ancestor.m_iRcvTimeOut;
00168    m_bReuseAddr = true; // this must be true, because all accepted sockets shared the same port with the listener
00169    m_llMaxBW = ancestor.m_llMaxBW;
00170 
00171    m_pCCFactory = ancestor.m_pCCFactory->clone();
00172    m_pCC = NULL;
00173    m_pCache = ancestor.m_pCache;
00174 
00175    // Initial status
00176    m_bOpened = false;
00177    m_bListening = false;
00178    m_bConnected = false;
00179    m_bClosing = false;
00180    m_bShutdown = false;
00181    m_bBroken = false;
00182    m_bPeerHealth = true;
00183    m_ullLingerExpiration = 0;
00184 }

00186 CUDT::~CUDT()
00187 {
00188    // release mutex/condtion variables
00189    destroySynch();
00190 
00191    // destroy the data structures
00192    delete m_pSndBuffer;
00193    delete m_pRcvBuffer;
00194    delete m_pSndLossList;
00195    delete m_pRcvLossList;
00196    delete m_pACKWindow;
00197    delete m_pSndTimeWindow;
00198    delete m_pRcvTimeWindow;
00199    delete m_pCCFactory;
00200    delete m_pCC;
00201    delete m_pPeerAddr;
00202    delete m_pSNode;
00203    delete m_pRNode;
00204 }

00206 void CUDT::setOpt(UDTOpt optName, const void* optval, const int&)
00207 {
00208    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
00209       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
00210 
00211    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00212    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
00213    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
00214 
00215    switch (optName)
00216    {
00217    case UDT_MSS:
00218       if (m_bOpened)
00219          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00220 
00221       if (*(int*)optval < int(28 + CHandShake::m_iContentSize))
00222          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00223 
00224       m_iMSS = *(int*)optval;
00225 
00226       // Packet size cannot be greater than UDP buffer size
00227       if (m_iMSS > m_iUDPSndBufSize)
00228          m_iMSS = m_iUDPSndBufSize;
00229       if (m_iMSS > m_iUDPRcvBufSize)
00230          m_iMSS = m_iUDPRcvBufSize;
00231 
00232       break;
00233 
00234    case UDT_SNDSYN:
00235       m_bSynSending = *(bool *)optval;
00236       break;
00237 
00238    case UDT_RCVSYN:
00239       m_bSynRecving = *(bool *)optval;
00240       break;
00241 
00242    case UDT_CC:
00243       if (m_bConnected)
00244          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00245       if (NULL != m_pCCFactory)
00246          delete m_pCCFactory;
00247       m_pCCFactory = ((CCCVirtualFactory *)optval)->clone();
00248 
00249       break;
00250 
00251    case UDT_FC:
00252       if (m_bConnected)
00253          throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00254 
00255       if (*(int*)optval < 1)
00256          throw CUDTException(5, 3);
00257 
00258       // Mimimum recv flight flag size is 32 packets
00259       if (*(int*)optval > 32)
00260          m_iFlightFlagSize = *(int*)optval;
00261       else
00262          m_iFlightFlagSize = 32;
00263 
00264       break;
00265 
00266    case UDT_SNDBUF:
00267       if (m_bOpened)
00268          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00269 
00270       if (*(int*)optval <= 0)
00271          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00272 
00273       m_iSndBufSize = *(int*)optval / (m_iMSS - 28);
00274 
00275       break;
00276 
00277    case UDT_RCVBUF:
00278       if (m_bOpened)
00279          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00280 
00281       if (*(int*)optval <= 0)
00282          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00283 
00284       // Mimimum recv buffer size is 32 packets
00285       if (*(int*)optval > (m_iMSS - 28) * 32)
00286          m_iRcvBufSize = *(int*)optval / (m_iMSS - 28);
00287       else
00288          m_iRcvBufSize = 32;
00289 
00290       // recv buffer MUST not be greater than FC size
00291       if (m_iRcvBufSize > m_iFlightFlagSize)
00292          m_iRcvBufSize = m_iFlightFlagSize;
00293 
00294       break;
00295 
00296    case UDT_LINGER:
00297       m_Linger = *(linger*)optval;
00298       break;
00299 
00300    case UDP_SNDBUF:
00301       if (m_bOpened)
00302          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00303 
00304       m_iUDPSndBufSize = *(int*)optval;
00305 
00306       if (m_iUDPSndBufSize < m_iMSS)
00307          m_iUDPSndBufSize = m_iMSS;
00308 
00309       break;
00310 
00311    case UDP_RCVBUF:
00312       if (m_bOpened)
00313          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00314 
00315       m_iUDPRcvBufSize = *(int*)optval;
00316 
00317       if (m_iUDPRcvBufSize < m_iMSS)
00318          m_iUDPRcvBufSize = m_iMSS;
00319 
00320       break;
00321 
00322    case UDT_RENDEZVOUS:
00323       if (m_bConnected)
00324          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00325       m_bRendezvous = *(bool *)optval;
00326       break;
00327 
00328    case UDT_SNDTIMEO: 
00329       m_iSndTimeOut = *(int*)optval; 
00330       break; 
00331     
00332    case UDT_RCVTIMEO: 
00333       m_iRcvTimeOut = *(int*)optval; 
00334       break; 
00335 
00336    case UDT_REUSEADDR:
00337       if (m_bOpened)
00338          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00339       m_bReuseAddr = *(bool*)optval;
00340       break;
00341 
00342    case UDT_MAXBW:
00343       if (m_bConnected)
00344          throw CUDTException(5, 1, 0);
00345       m_llMaxBW = *(int64_t*)optval;
00346       break;
00347     
00348    default:
00349       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00350    }
00351 }
00352 
00353 void CUDT::getOpt(UDTOpt optName, void* optval, int& optlen)
00354 {
00355    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00356 
00357    switch (optName)
00358    {
00359    case UDT_MSS:
00360       *(int*)optval = m_iMSS;
00361       optlen = sizeof(int);
00362       break;
00363 
00364    case UDT_SNDSYN:
00365       *(bool*)optval = m_bSynSending;
00366       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00367       break;
00368 
00369    case UDT_RCVSYN:
00370       *(bool*)optval = m_bSynRecving;
00371       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00372       break;
00373 
00374    case UDT_CC:
00375       if (!m_bOpened)
00376          throw CUDTException(5, 5, 0);
00377       *(CCC**)optval = m_pCC;
00378       optlen = sizeof(CCC*);
00379 
00380       break;
00381 
00382    case UDT_FC:
00383       *(int*)optval = m_iFlightFlagSize;
00384       optlen = sizeof(int);
00385       break;
00386 
00387    case UDT_SNDBUF:
00388       *(int*)optval = m_iSndBufSize * (m_iMSS - 28);
00389       optlen = sizeof(int);
00390       break;
00391 
00392    case UDT_RCVBUF:
00393       *(int*)optval = m_iRcvBufSize * (m_iMSS - 28);
00394       optlen = sizeof(int);
00395       break;
00396 
00397    case UDT_LINGER:
00398       if (optlen < (int)(sizeof(linger)))
00399          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00400 
00401       *(linger*)optval = m_Linger;
00402       optlen = sizeof(linger);
00403       break;
00404 
00405    case UDP_SNDBUF:
00406       *(int*)optval = m_iUDPSndBufSize;
00407       optlen = sizeof(int);
00408       break;
00409 
00410    case UDP_RCVBUF:
00411       *(int*)optval = m_iUDPRcvBufSize;
00412       optlen = sizeof(int);
00413       break;
00414 
00415    case UDT_RENDEZVOUS:
00416       *(bool *)optval = m_bRendezvous;
00417       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00418       break;
00419 
00420    case UDT_SNDTIMEO: 
00421       *(int*)optval = m_iSndTimeOut; 
00422       optlen = sizeof(int); 
00423       break; 
00424     
00425    case UDT_RCVTIMEO: 
00426       *(int*)optval = m_iRcvTimeOut; 
00427       optlen = sizeof(int); 
00428       break; 
00429 
00430    case UDT_REUSEADDR:
00431       *(bool *)optval = m_bReuseAddr;
00432       optlen = sizeof(bool);
00433       break;
00434 
00435    case UDT_MAXBW:
00436       *(int64_t*)optval = m_llMaxBW;
00437       break;
00438 
00439    default:
00440       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00441    }
00442 }
00443 
00444 void CUDT::open()
00445 {
00446    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00447 
00448    // Initial sequence number, loss, acknowledgement, etc.
00449    m_iPktSize = m_iMSS - 28;
00450    m_iPayloadSize = m_iPktSize - CPacket::m_iPktHdrSize;
00451 
00452    m_iEXPCount = 1;
00453    m_iBandwidth = 1;
00454    m_iDeliveryRate = 16;
00455    m_iAckSeqNo = 0;
00456    m_ullLastAckTime = 0;
00457 
00458    // trace information
00459    m_StartTime = CTimer::getTime();
00460    m_llSentTotal = m_llRecvTotal = m_iSndLossTotal = m_iRcvLossTotal = m_iRetransTotal = m_iSentACKTotal = m_iRecvACKTotal = m_iSentNAKTotal = m_iRecvNAKTotal = 0;
00461    m_LastSampleTime = CTimer::getTime();
00462    m_llTraceSent = m_llTraceRecv = m_iTraceSndLoss = m_iTraceRcvLoss = m_iTraceRetrans = m_iSentACK = m_iRecvACK = m_iSentNAK = m_iRecvNAK = 0;
00463    m_llSndDuration = m_llSndDurationTotal = 0;
00464 
00465    // structures for queue
00466    if (NULL == m_pSNode)
00467       m_pSNode = new CSNode;
00468    m_pSNode->m_pUDT = this;
00469    m_pSNode->m_llTimeStamp = 1;
00470    m_pSNode->m_iHeapLoc = -1;
00471 
00472    if (NULL == m_pRNode)
00473       m_pRNode = new CRNode;
00474    m_pRNode->m_pUDT = this;
00475    m_pRNode->m_llTimeStamp = 1;
00476    m_pRNode->m_pPrev = m_pRNode->m_pNext = NULL;
00477    m_pRNode->m_bOnList = false;
00478 
00479    m_iRTT = 10 * m_iSYNInterval;
00480    m_iRTTVar = m_iRTT >> 1;
00481    m_ullCPUFrequency = CTimer::getCPUFrequency();
00482 
00483    // set up the timers
00484    m_ullSYNInt = m_iSYNInterval * m_ullCPUFrequency;
00485   
00486    m_ullMinExpInt = 100000 * m_ullCPUFrequency;
00487 
00488    m_ullACKInt = m_ullSYNInt;
00489    m_ullNAKInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency;
00490    m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
00491    m_llLastRspTime = CTimer::getTime();
00492 
00493    CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextACKTime);
00494    m_ullNextACKTime += m_ullSYNInt;
00495    CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextNAKTime);
00496    m_ullNextNAKTime += m_ullNAKInt;
00497    CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextEXPTime);
00498    m_ullNextEXPTime += m_ullEXPInt;
00499 
00500    m_iPktCount = 0;
00501    m_iLightACKCount = 1;
00502 
00503    m_ullTargetTime = 0;
00504    m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
00505 
00506    // Now UDT is opened.
00507    m_bOpened = true;
00508 }
00509 
00510 void CUDT::listen()
00511 {
00512    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00513 
00514    if (!m_bOpened)
00515       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00516 
00517    if (m_bConnected)
00518       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00519 
00520    // listen can be called more than once
00521    if (m_bListening)
00522       return;
00523 
00524    // if there is already another socket listening on the same port
00525    if (m_pRcvQueue->setListener(this) < 0)
00526       throw CUDTException(5, 11, 0);
00527 
00528    m_bListening = true;
00529 }
00530 
00531 void CUDT::connect(const sockaddr* serv_addr)
00532 {
00533    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00534 
00535    if (!m_bOpened)
00536       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00537 
00538    if (m_bListening)
00539       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00540 
00541    if (m_bConnected)
00542       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00543 
00544    // register this socket in the rendezvous queue
00545    // RendezevousQueue is used to temporarily store incoming handshake, non-rendezvous connections also require this function
00546    m_pRcvQueue->m_pRendezvousQueue->insert(m_SocketID, m_iIPversion, serv_addr);
00547 
00548    CPacket request;
00549    char* reqdata = new char [m_iPayloadSize];
00550    CHandShake req;
00551 
00552    CPacket response;
00553    char* resdata = new char [m_iPayloadSize];
00554    CHandShake res;
00555 
00556    // This is my current configurations
00557    req.m_iVersion = m_iVersion;
00558    req.m_iType = m_iSockType;
00559    req.m_iMSS = m_iMSS;
00560    req.m_iFlightFlagSize = (m_iRcvBufSize < m_iFlightFlagSize)? m_iRcvBufSize : m_iFlightFlagSize;
00561    req.m_iReqType = (!m_bRendezvous) ? 1 : 0;
00562    req.m_iID = m_SocketID;
00563    CIPAddress::ntop(serv_addr, req.m_piPeerIP, m_iIPversion);
00564 
00565    // Random Initial Sequence Number
00566    srand((unsigned int)CTimer::getTime());
00567    m_iISN = req.m_iISN = (int32_t)(CSeqNo::m_iMaxSeqNo * (double(rand()) / RAND_MAX));
00568 
00569    m_iLastDecSeq = req.m_iISN - 1;
00570    m_iSndLastAck = req.m_iISN;
00571    m_iSndLastDataAck = req.m_iISN;
00572    m_iSndCurrSeqNo = req.m_iISN - 1;
00573    m_iSndLastAck2 = req.m_iISN;
00574    m_ullSndLastAck2Time = CTimer::getTime();
00575 
00576    // Inform the server my configurations.
00577    request.pack(0, NULL, reqdata, m_iPayloadSize);
00578    // ID = 0, connection request
00579    request.m_iID = 0;
00580 
00581    // Wait for the negotiated configurations from the peer side.
00582    response.pack(0, NULL, resdata, m_iPayloadSize);
00583 
00584    uint64_t timeo = 3000000;
00585    if (m_bRendezvous)
00586       timeo *= 10;
00587    uint64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00588    uint64_t last_req_time = 0;
00589 
00590    CUDTException e(0, 0);
00591    char* tmp = NULL;
00592 
00593    while (!m_bClosing)
00594    {
00595       // avoid sending too many requests, at most 1 request per 250ms
00596       if (CTimer::getTime() - last_req_time > 250000)
00597       {
00598          req.serialize(reqdata, m_iPayloadSize);
00599          request.setLength(CHandShake::m_iContentSize);
00600          m_pSndQueue->sendto(serv_addr, request);
00601 
00602          last_req_time = CTimer::getTime();
00603       }
00604 
00605       response.setLength(m_iPayloadSize);
00606       if (m_pRcvQueue->recvfrom(m_SocketID, response) > 0)
00607       {
00608          if (m_bRendezvous && ((0 == response.getFlag()) || (1 == response.getType())) && (NULL != tmp))
00609          {
00610             // a data packet or a keep-alive packet comes, which means the peer side is already connected
00611             // in this situation, a previously recorded response (tmp) will be used
00612             res.deserialize(tmp, CHandShake::m_iContentSize);
00613             memcpy(m_piSelfIP, res.m_piPeerIP, 16);
00614             break;
00615          }
00616 
00617          if ((1 != response.getFlag()) || (0 != response.getType()))
00618             response.setLength(-1);
00619          else
00620          {
00621             res.deserialize(response.m_pcData, response.getLength());
00622 
00623             if (m_bRendezvous)
00624             {
00625                // regular connect should NOT communicate with rendezvous connect
00626                // rendezvous connect require 3-way handshake
00627                if (1 == res.m_iReqType)
00628                   response.setLength(-1);
00629                else if ((0 == res.m_iReqType) || (0 == req.m_iReqType))
00630                {
00631                   if (NULL == tmp)
00632                      tmp = new char [m_iPayloadSize];
00633                   res.serialize(tmp, m_iPayloadSize);
00634 
00635                   req.m_iReqType = -1;
00636                   request.m_iID = res.m_iID;
00637                   response.setLength(-1);
00638                }
00639             }
00640             else
00641             {
00642                // set cookie
00643                if (1 == res.m_iReqType)
00644                {
00645                   req.m_iReqType = -1;
00646                   req.m_iCookie = res.m_iCookie;
00647                   response.setLength(-1);
00648                }
00649             }
00650          }
00651 
00652          // new request/response should be sent out immediately on receving a response
00653          last_req_time = 0;
00654       }
00655 
00656       if (response.getLength() > 0)
00657       {
00658          memcpy(m_piSelfIP, res.m_piPeerIP, 16);
00659          break;
00660       }
00661 
00662       if (CTimer::getTime() > entertime + timeo)
00663       {
00664          // timeout
00665          e = CUDTException(1, 1, 0);
00666          break;
00667       }
00668    }
00669 
00670    delete [] tmp;
00671    delete [] reqdata;
00672    delete [] resdata;
00673 
00674    // remove from rendezvous queue
00675    m_pRcvQueue->m_pRendezvousQueue->remove(m_SocketID);
00676 
00677    if (e.getErrorCode() == 0)
00678    {
00679       if (m_bClosing)                                           // if the socket is closed before connection...
00680          e = CUDTException(1);
00681       else if (1002 == res.m_iReqType)                          // connection request rejected
00682          e = CUDTException(1, 2, 0);
00683       else if ((!m_bRendezvous) && (m_iISN != res.m_iISN))      // secuity check
00684          e = CUDTException(1, 4, 0);
00685    }
00686 
00687    if (e.getErrorCode() != 0)
00688    {
00689       throw e;
00690    }
00691 
00692    // Got it. Re-configure according to the negotiated values.
00693    m_iMSS = res.m_iMSS;
00694    m_iFlowWindowSize = res.m_iFlightFlagSize;
00695    m_iPktSize = m_iMSS - 28;
00696    m_iPayloadSize = m_iPktSize - CPacket::m_iPktHdrSize;
00697    m_iPeerISN = res.m_iISN;
00698    m_iRcvLastAck = res.m_iISN;
00699    m_iRcvLastAckAck = res.m_iISN;
00700    m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = res.m_iISN - 1;
00701    m_PeerID = res.m_iID;
00702 
00703    // Prepare all data structures
00704    try
00705    {
00706       m_pSndBuffer = new CSndBuffer(32, m_iPayloadSize);
00707       m_pRcvBuffer = new CRcvBuffer(m_iRcvBufSize, &(m_pRcvQueue->m_UnitQueue));
00708       // after introducing lite ACK, the sndlosslist may not be cleared in time, so it requires twice space.
00709       m_pSndLossList = new CSndLossList(m_iFlowWindowSize * 2);
00710       m_pRcvLossList = new CRcvLossList(m_iFlightFlagSize);
00711       m_pACKWindow = new CACKWindow(4096);
00712       m_pRcvTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow(16, 64);
00713       m_pSndTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow();
00714    }
00715    catch (...)
00716    {
00717       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00718    }
00719 
00720    m_pCC = m_pCCFactory->create();
00721    m_pCC->m_UDT = m_SocketID;
00722    m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
00723    m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
00724 
00725    CInfoBlock ib;
00726    if (m_pCache->lookup(serv_addr, m_iIPversion, &ib) >= 0)
00727    {
00728       m_iRTT = ib.m_iRTT;
00729       m_iBandwidth = ib.m_iBandwidth;
00730    }
00731 
00732    m_pCC->setMSS(m_iMSS);
00733    m_pCC->setMaxCWndSize((int&)m_iFlowWindowSize);
00734    m_pCC->setSndCurrSeqNo((int32_t&)m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
00735    m_pCC->setRcvRate(m_iDeliveryRate);
00736    m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
00737    m_pCC->setBandwidth(m_iBandwidth);
00738    if (m_llMaxBW > 0) m_pCC->setUserParam((char*)&(m_llMaxBW), 8);
00739    m_pCC->init();
00740 
00741    m_pPeerAddr = (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in : (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in6;
00742    memcpy(m_pPeerAddr, serv_addr, (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? sizeof(sockaddr_in) : sizeof(sockaddr_in6));
00743 
00744    // And, I am connected too.
00745    m_bConnected = true;
00746 
00747    // register this socket for receiving data packets
00748    m_pRNode->m_bOnList = true;
00749    m_pRcvQueue->setNewEntry(this);
00750 
00751    // acknowledde any waiting epolls to read/write
00752    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
00753    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
00754 }
00755 
00756 void CUDT::connect(const sockaddr* peer, CHandShake* hs)
00757 {
00758    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00759 
00760    // Uses the smaller MSS between the peers        
00761    if (hs->m_iMSS > m_iMSS)
00762       hs->m_iMSS = m_iMSS;
00763    else
00764       m_iMSS = hs->m_iMSS;
00765 
00766    // exchange info for maximum flow window size
00767    m_iFlowWindowSize = hs->m_iFlightFlagSize;
00768    hs->m_iFlightFlagSize = (m_iRcvBufSize < m_iFlightFlagSize)? m_iRcvBufSize : m_iFlightFlagSize;
00769 
00770    m_iPeerISN = hs->m_iISN;
00771 
00772    m_iRcvLastAck = hs->m_iISN;
00773    m_iRcvLastAckAck = hs->m_iISN;
00774    m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = hs->m_iISN - 1;
00775 
00776    m_PeerID = hs->m_iID;
00777    hs->m_iID = m_SocketID;
00778 
00779    // use peer's ISN and send it back for security check
00780    m_iISN = hs->m_iISN;
00781 
00782    m_iLastDecSeq = m_iISN - 1;
00783    m_iSndLastAck = m_iISN;
00784    m_iSndLastDataAck = m_iISN;
00785    m_iSndCurrSeqNo = m_iISN - 1;
00786    m_iSndLastAck2 = m_iISN;
00787    m_ullSndLastAck2Time = CTimer::getTime();
00788 
00789    // this is a reponse handshake
00790    hs->m_iReqType = -1;
00791 
00792    // get local IP address and send the peer its IP address (because UDP cannot get local IP address)
00793    memcpy(m_piSelfIP, hs->m_piPeerIP, 16);
00794    CIPAddress::ntop(peer, hs->m_piPeerIP, m_iIPversion);
00795   
00796    m_iPktSize = m_iMSS - 28;
00797    m_iPayloadSize = m_iPktSize - CPacket::m_iPktHdrSize;
00798 
00799    // Prepare all structures
00800    try
00801    {
00802       m_pSndBuffer = new CSndBuffer(32, m_iPayloadSize);
00803       m_pRcvBuffer = new CRcvBuffer(m_iRcvBufSize, &(m_pRcvQueue->m_UnitQueue));
00804       m_pSndLossList = new CSndLossList(m_iFlowWindowSize * 2);
00805       m_pRcvLossList = new CRcvLossList(m_iFlightFlagSize);
00806       m_pACKWindow = new CACKWindow(4096);
00807       m_pRcvTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow(16, 64);
00808       m_pSndTimeWindow = new CPktTimeWindow();
00809    }
00810    catch (...)
00811    {
00812       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00813    }
00814 
00815    m_pCC = m_pCCFactory->create();
00816    m_pCC->m_UDT = m_SocketID;
00817    m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
00818    m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
00819 
00820    CInfoBlock ib;
00821    if (m_pCache->lookup(peer, m_iIPversion, &ib) >= 0)
00822    {
00823       m_iRTT = ib.m_iRTT;
00824       m_iBandwidth = ib.m_iBandwidth;
00825    }
00826 
00827    m_pCC->setMSS(m_iMSS);
00828    m_pCC->setMaxCWndSize((int&)m_iFlowWindowSize);
00829    m_pCC->setSndCurrSeqNo((int32_t&)m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
00830    m_pCC->setRcvRate(m_iDeliveryRate);
00831    m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
00832    m_pCC->setBandwidth(m_iBandwidth);
00833    if (m_llMaxBW > 0) m_pCC->setUserParam((char*)&(m_llMaxBW), 8);
00834    m_pCC->init();
00835 
00836    m_pPeerAddr = (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in : (sockaddr*)new sockaddr_in6;
00837    memcpy(m_pPeerAddr, peer, (AF_INET == m_iIPversion) ? sizeof(sockaddr_in) : sizeof(sockaddr_in6));
00838 
00839    // And of course, it is connected.
00840    m_bConnected = true;
00841 
00842    // register this socket for receiving data packets
00843    m_pRNode->m_bOnList = true;
00844    m_pRcvQueue->setNewEntry(this);
00845 
00846    //send the response to the peer, see listen() for more discussions about this
00847    CPacket response;
00848    int size = CHandShake::m_iContentSize;
00849    char* buffer = new char[size];
00850    hs->serialize(buffer, size);
00851    response.pack(0, NULL, buffer, size);
00852    response.m_iID = m_PeerID;
00853    m_pSndQueue->sendto(peer, response);
00854    delete [] buffer;
00855 }
00856 
00857 void CUDT::close()
00858 {
00859    if (!m_bOpened)
00860       return;
00861 
00862    if (0 != m_Linger.l_onoff)
00863    {
00864       uint64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00865 
00866       while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && (m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize() > 0) && (CTimer::getTime() - entertime < m_Linger.l_linger * 1000000ULL))
00867       {
00868          // linger has been checked by previous close() call and has expired
00869          if (m_ullLingerExpiration >= entertime)
00870             break;
00871 
00872          if (!m_bSynSending)
00873          {
00874             // if this socket enables asynchronous sending, return immediately and let GC to close it later
00875             if (0 == m_ullLingerExpiration)
00876                m_ullLingerExpiration = entertime + m_Linger.l_linger * 1000000ULL;
00877 
00878             return;
00879          }
00880 
00881          #ifndef WIN32
00882             timespec ts;
00883             ts.tv_sec = 0;
00884             ts.tv_nsec = 1000000;
00885             nanosleep(&ts, NULL);
00886          #else
00887             Sleep(1);
00888          #endif
00889       }
00890    }
00891 
00892    // remove this socket from the snd queue
00893    if (m_bConnected)
00894       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->remove(this);
00895 
00896    // remove itself from all epoll monitoring
00897    for (set<int>::iterator i = m_sPollID.begin(); i != m_sPollID.end(); ++ i)
00898       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.remove_usock(*i, m_SocketID);
00899 
00900    CGuard cg(m_ConnectionLock);
00901 
00902    if (!m_bOpened)
00903       return;
00904 
00905    // Inform the threads handler to stop.
00906    m_bClosing = true;
00907 
00908    // Signal the sender and recver if they are waiting for data.
00909    releaseSynch();
00910 
00911    if (m_bListening)
00912    {
00913       m_bListening = false;
00914       m_pRcvQueue->removeListener(this);
00915    }
00916    if (m_bConnected)
00917    {
00918       if (!m_bShutdown)
00919          sendCtrl(5);
00920 
00921       m_pCC->close();
00922 
00923       CInfoBlock ib;
00924       ib.m_iRTT = m_iRTT;
00925       ib.m_iBandwidth = m_iBandwidth;
00926       m_pCache->update(m_pPeerAddr, m_iIPversion, &ib);
00927 
00928       m_bConnected = false;
00929    }
00930 
00931    // waiting all send and recv calls to stop
00932    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
00933    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
00934 
00935    // CLOSED.
00936    m_bOpened = false;
00937 }
00938 
00939 int CUDT::send(const char* data, const int& len)
00940 {
00941    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
00942       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
00943 
00944    // throw an exception if not connected
00945    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
00946       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
00947    else if (!m_bConnected)
00948       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
00949 
00950    if (len <= 0)
00951       return 0;
00952 
00953    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
00954 
00955    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
00956    {
00957       if (!m_bSynSending)
00958          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0);
00959       else
00960       {
00961          // wait here during a blocking sending
00962          #ifndef WIN32
00963             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
00964             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0) 
00965             { 
00966                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
00967                   pthread_cond_wait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock);
00968             }
00969             else
00970             {
00971                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
00972                timespec locktime; 
00973     
00974                locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
00975                locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
00976 
00977                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
00978                   pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock, &locktime);
00979             }
00980             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
00981          #else
00982             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0)
00983             {
00984                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
00985                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, INFINITE);
00986             }
00987             else 
00988             {
00989                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
00990 
00991                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
00992                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, DWORD((exptime - CTimer::getTime()) / 1000)); 
00993             }
00994          #endif
00995 
00996          // check the connection status
00997          if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
00998             throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
00999          else if (!m_bConnected)
01000             throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01001          else if (!m_bPeerHealth)
01002          {
01003             m_bPeerHealth = true;
01004             throw CUDTException(7);
01005          }
01006       }
01007    }
01008 
01009    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01010    {
01011       if (m_iSndTimeOut >= 0)
01012          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0); 
01013 
01014       return 0;
01015    }
01016 
01017    int size = (m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize;
01018    if (size > len)
01019       size = len;
01020 
01021    // record total time used for sending
01022    if (0 == m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01023       m_llSndDurationCounter = CTimer::getTime();
01024 
01025    // insert the user buffer into the sening list
01026    m_pSndBuffer->addBuffer(data, size);
01027 
01028    // insert this socket to snd list if it is not on the list yet
01029    m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01030 
01031    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01032    {
01033       // write is not available any more
01034       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01035    }
01036 
01037    return size;
01038 }
01039 
01040 int CUDT::recv(char* data, const int& len)
01041 {
01042    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
01043       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
01044 
01045    // throw an exception if not connected
01046    if (!m_bConnected)
01047       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01048    else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01049       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01050 
01051    if (len <= 0)
01052       return 0;
01053 
01054    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
01055 
01056    if (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize())
01057    {
01058       if (!m_bSynRecving)
01059          throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01060       else
01061       {
01062          #ifndef WIN32
01063             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01064             if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0) 
01065             { 
01066                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01067                   pthread_cond_wait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock);
01068             }
01069             else
01070             {
01071                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iRcvTimeOut * 1000ULL; 
01072                timespec locktime; 
01073     
01074                locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
01075                locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
01076 
01077                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01078                {
01079                   pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock, &locktime); 
01080                   if (CTimer::getTime() >= exptime)
01081                      break;
01082                }
01083             }
01084             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01085          #else
01086             if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0)
01087             {
01088                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01089                   WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, INFINITE);
01090             }
01091             else
01092             {
01093                uint64_t enter_time = CTimer::getTime();
01094 
01095                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01096                {
01097                   int diff = int(CTimer::getTime() - enter_time) / 1000;
01098                   if (diff >= m_iRcvTimeOut)
01099                       break;
01100                   WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, DWORD(m_iRcvTimeOut - diff ));
01101                }
01102             }
01103          #endif
01104       }
01105    }
01106 
01107    // throw an exception if not connected
01108    if (!m_bConnected)
01109       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01110    else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01111       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01112 
01113    int res = m_pRcvBuffer->readBuffer(data, len);
01114 
01115    if (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() <= 0)
01116    {
01117       // read is not available any more
01118       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01119    }
01120 
01121    if ((res <= 0) && (m_iRcvTimeOut >= 0))
01122       throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01123 
01124    return res;
01125 }
01126 
01127 int CUDT::sendmsg(const char* data, const int& len, const int& msttl, const bool& inorder)
01128 {
01129    if (UDT_STREAM == m_iSockType)
01130       throw CUDTException(5, 9, 0);
01131 
01132    // throw an exception if not connected
01133    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01134       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01135    else if (!m_bConnected)
01136       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01137 
01138    if (len <= 0)
01139       return 0;
01140 
01141    if (len > m_iSndBufSize * m_iPayloadSize)
01142       throw CUDTException(5, 12, 0);
01143 
01144    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
01145 
01146    if ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len)
01147    {
01148       if (!m_bSynSending)
01149          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0);
01150       else
01151       {
01152          // wait here during a blocking sending
01153          #ifndef WIN32
01154             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01155             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0)
01156             {
01157                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len))
01158                   pthread_cond_wait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock);
01159             }
01160             else
01161             {
01162                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
01163                timespec locktime;
01164 
01165                locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
01166                locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
01167 
01168                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len) && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
01169                   pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock, &locktime);
01170             }
01171             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01172          #else
01173             if (m_iSndTimeOut < 0)
01174             {
01175                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len))
01176                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, INFINITE);
01177             }
01178             else
01179             {
01180                uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iSndTimeOut * 1000ULL;
01181 
01182                while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len) && (CTimer::getTime() < exptime))
01183                   WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, DWORD((exptime - CTimer::getTime()) / 1000));
01184             }
01185          #endif
01186 
01187          // check the connection status
01188          if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01189             throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01190          else if (!m_bConnected)
01191             throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01192       }
01193    }
01194 
01195    if ((m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iPayloadSize < len)
01196    {
01197       if (m_iSndTimeOut >= 0)
01198          throw CUDTException(6, 1, 0);
01199 
01200       return 0;
01201    }
01202 
01203    // record total time used for sending
01204    if (0 == m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01205       m_llSndDurationCounter = CTimer::getTime();
01206 
01207    // insert the user buffer into the sening list
01208    m_pSndBuffer->addBuffer(data, len, msttl, inorder);
01209 
01210    // insert this socket to the snd list if it is not on the list yet
01211    m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01212 
01213    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01214    {
01215       // write is not available any more
01216       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01217    }
01218 
01219    return len;   
01220 }
01221 
01222 int CUDT::recvmsg(char* data, const int& len)
01223 {
01224    if (UDT_STREAM == m_iSockType)
01225       throw CUDTException(5, 9, 0);
01226 
01227    // throw an exception if not connected
01228    if (!m_bConnected)
01229       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01230 
01231    if (len <= 0)
01232       return 0;
01233 
01234    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
01235 
01236    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01237    {
01238       int res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);
01239       if (0 == res)
01240       {
01241          // read is not available
01242          s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01243 
01244          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01245       }
01246       else
01247          return res;
01248    }
01249 
01250    if (!m_bSynRecving)
01251    {
01252       int res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);
01253       if (0 == res)
01254          throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01255       else
01256          return res;
01257    }
01258 
01259    int res = 0;
01260    bool timeout = false;
01261 
01262    do
01263    {
01264       #ifndef WIN32
01265          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01266 
01267          if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0)
01268          {
01269             while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == (res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len))))
01270                pthread_cond_wait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock);
01271          }
01272          else
01273          {
01274             uint64_t exptime = CTimer::getTime() + m_iRcvTimeOut * 1000ULL;
01275             timespec locktime;
01276 
01277             locktime.tv_sec = exptime / 1000000;
01278             locktime.tv_nsec = (exptime % 1000000) * 1000;
01279 
01280             if (pthread_cond_timedwait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock, &locktime) == ETIMEDOUT)
01281                timeout = true;
01282 
01283             res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);           
01284          }
01285          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01286       #else
01287          if (m_iRcvTimeOut < 0)
01288          {
01289             while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == (res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len))))
01290                WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, INFINITE);
01291          }
01292          else
01293          {
01294             if (WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, DWORD(m_iRcvTimeOut)) == WAIT_TIMEOUT)
01295                timeout = true;
01296 
01297             res = m_pRcvBuffer->readMsg(data, len);
01298          }
01299       #endif
01300 
01301       if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01302          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01303       else if (!m_bConnected)
01304          throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01305    } while ((0 == res) && !timeout);
01306 
01307    if (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvMsgNum() <= 0)
01308    {
01309       // read is not available any more
01310       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01311    }
01312 
01313    if ((res <= 0) && (m_iRcvTimeOut >= 0))
01314       throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
01315 
01316    return res;
01317 }
01318 
01319 int64_t CUDT::sendfile(fstream& ifs, int64_t& offset, const int64_t& size, const int& block)
01320 {
01321    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
01322       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
01323 
01324    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01325       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01326    else if (!m_bConnected)
01327       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01328 
01329    if (size <= 0)
01330       return 0;
01331 
01332    CGuard sendguard(m_SendLock);
01333 
01334    int64_t tosend = size;
01335    int unitsize;
01336 
01337    // positioning...
01338    try
01339    {
01340       ifs.seekg((streamoff)offset);
01341    }
01342    catch (...)
01343    {
01344       throw CUDTException(4, 1);
01345    }
01346 
01347    // sending block by block
01348    while (tosend > 0)
01349    {
01350       if (ifs.fail())
01351          throw CUDTException(4, 4);
01352 
01353       if (ifs.eof())
01354          break;
01355 
01356       unitsize = int((tosend >= block) ? block : tosend);
01357 
01358       #ifndef WIN32
01359          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01360          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
01361             pthread_cond_wait(&m_SendBlockCond, &m_SendBlockLock);
01362          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01363       #else
01364          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) && m_bPeerHealth)
01365             WaitForSingleObject(m_SendBlockCond, INFINITE);
01366       #endif
01367 
01368       if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01369          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01370       else if (!m_bConnected)
01371          throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01372       else if (!m_bPeerHealth)
01373       {
01374          // reset peer health status, once this error returns, the app should handle the situation at the peer side
01375          m_bPeerHealth = true;
01376          throw CUDTException(7);
01377       }
01378 
01379       // record total time used for sending
01380       if (0 == m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01381          m_llSndDurationCounter = CTimer::getTime();
01382 
01383       int64_t sentsize = m_pSndBuffer->addBufferFromFile(ifs, unitsize);
01384 
01385       if (sentsize > 0)
01386       {
01387          tosend -= sentsize;
01388          offset += sentsize;
01389       }
01390 
01391       // insert this socket to snd list if it is not on the list yet
01392       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01393    }
01394 
01395    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
01396    {
01397       // write is not available any more
01398       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01399    }
01400 
01401    return size - tosend;
01402 }
01403 
01404 int64_t CUDT::recvfile(fstream& ofs, int64_t& offset, const int64_t& size, const int& block)
01405 {
01406    if (UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType)
01407       throw CUDTException(5, 10, 0);
01408 
01409    if (!m_bConnected)
01410       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01411    else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01412       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01413 
01414    if (size <= 0)
01415       return 0;
01416 
01417    CGuard recvguard(m_RecvLock);
01418 
01419    int64_t torecv = size;
01420    int unitsize = block;
01421    int recvsize;
01422 
01423    // positioning...
01424    try
01425    {
01426       ofs.seekp((streamoff)offset);
01427    }
01428    catch (...)
01429    {
01430       throw CUDTException(4, 3);
01431    }
01432 
01433    // receiving... "recvfile" is always blocking
01434    while (torecv > 0)
01435    {
01436       if (ofs.fail())
01437       {
01438          // send the sender a signal so it will not be blocked forever
01439          int32_t err_code = CUDTException::EFILE;
01440          sendCtrl(8, &err_code);
01441 
01442          throw CUDTException(4, 4);
01443       }
01444 
01445       #ifndef WIN32
01446          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01447          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01448             pthread_cond_wait(&m_RecvDataCond, &m_RecvDataLock);
01449          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01450       #else
01451          while (!m_bBroken && m_bConnected && !m_bClosing && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01452             WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvDataCond, INFINITE);
01453       #endif
01454 
01455       if (!m_bConnected)
01456          throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01457       else if ((m_bBroken || m_bClosing) && (0 == m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize()))
01458          throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01459 
01460       unitsize = int((torecv >= block) ? block : torecv);
01461       recvsize = m_pRcvBuffer->readBufferToFile(ofs, unitsize);
01462 
01463       if (recvsize > 0)
01464       {
01465          torecv -= recvsize;
01466          offset += recvsize;
01467       }
01468    }
01469 
01470    if (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() <= 0)
01471    {
01472       // read is not available any more
01473       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01474    }
01475 
01476    return size - torecv;
01477 }
01478 
01479 void CUDT::sample(CPerfMon* perf, bool clear)
01480 {
01481    if (!m_bConnected)
01482       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
01483    if (m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
01484       throw CUDTException(2, 1, 0);
01485 
01486    uint64_t currtime = CTimer::getTime();
01487    perf->msTimeStamp = (currtime - m_StartTime) / 1000;
01488 
01489    perf->pktSent = m_llTraceSent;
01490    perf->pktRecv = m_llTraceRecv;
01491    perf->pktSndLoss = m_iTraceSndLoss;
01492    perf->pktRcvLoss = m_iTraceRcvLoss;
01493    perf->pktRetrans = m_iTraceRetrans;
01494    perf->pktSentACK = m_iSentACK;
01495    perf->pktRecvACK = m_iRecvACK;
01496    perf->pktSentNAK = m_iSentNAK;
01497    perf->pktRecvNAK = m_iRecvNAK;
01498    perf->usSndDuration = m_llSndDuration;
01499 
01500    perf->pktSentTotal = m_llSentTotal;
01501    perf->pktRecvTotal = m_llRecvTotal;
01502    perf->pktSndLossTotal = m_iSndLossTotal;
01503    perf->pktRcvLossTotal = m_iRcvLossTotal;
01504    perf->pktRetransTotal = m_iRetransTotal;
01505    perf->pktSentACKTotal = m_iSentACKTotal;
01506    perf->pktRecvACKTotal = m_iRecvACKTotal;
01507    perf->pktSentNAKTotal = m_iSentNAKTotal;
01508    perf->pktRecvNAKTotal = m_iRecvNAKTotal;
01509    perf->usSndDurationTotal = m_llSndDurationTotal;
01510 
01511    double interval = double(currtime - m_LastSampleTime);
01512 
01513    perf->mbpsSendRate = double(m_llTraceSent) * m_iPayloadSize * 8.0 / interval;
01514    perf->mbpsRecvRate = double(m_llTraceRecv) * m_iPayloadSize * 8.0 / interval;
01515 
01516    perf->usPktSndPeriod = m_ullInterval / double(m_ullCPUFrequency);
01517    perf->pktFlowWindow = m_iFlowWindowSize;
01518    perf->pktCongestionWindow = (int)m_dCongestionWindow;
01519    perf->pktFlightSize = CSeqNo::seqlen(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) - 1;
01520    perf->msRTT = m_iRTT/1000.0;
01521    perf->mbpsBandwidth = m_iBandwidth * m_iPayloadSize * 8.0 / 1000000.0;
01522 
01523    #ifndef WIN32
01524       if (0 == pthread_mutex_trylock(&m_ConnectionLock))
01525    #else
01526       if (WAIT_OBJECT_0 == WaitForSingleObject(m_ConnectionLock, 0))
01527    #endif
01528    {
01529       perf->byteAvailSndBuf = (NULL == m_pSndBuffer) ? 0 : (m_iSndBufSize - m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) * m_iMSS;
01530       perf->byteAvailRcvBuf = (NULL == m_pRcvBuffer) ? 0 : m_pRcvBuffer->getAvailBufSize() * m_iMSS;
01531 
01532       #ifndef WIN32
01533          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_ConnectionLock);
01534       #else
01535          ReleaseMutex(m_ConnectionLock);
01536       #endif
01537    }
01538    else
01539    {
01540       perf->byteAvailSndBuf = 0;
01541       perf->byteAvailRcvBuf = 0;
01542    }
01543 
01544    if (clear)
01545    {
01546       m_llTraceSent = m_llTraceRecv = m_iTraceSndLoss = m_iTraceRcvLoss = m_iTraceRetrans = m_iSentACK = m_iRecvACK = m_iSentNAK = m_iRecvNAK = 0;
01547       m_llSndDuration = 0;
01548       m_LastSampleTime = currtime;
01549    }
01550 }
01551 
01552 void CUDT::initSynch()
01553 {
01554    #ifndef WIN32
01555       pthread_mutex_init(&m_SendBlockLock, NULL);
01556       pthread_cond_init(&m_SendBlockCond, NULL);
01557       pthread_mutex_init(&m_RecvDataLock, NULL);
01558       pthread_cond_init(&m_RecvDataCond, NULL);
01559       pthread_mutex_init(&m_SendLock, NULL);
01560       pthread_mutex_init(&m_RecvLock, NULL);
01561       pthread_mutex_init(&m_AckLock, NULL);
01562       pthread_mutex_init(&m_ConnectionLock, NULL);
01563    #else
01564       m_SendBlockLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01565       m_SendBlockCond = CreateEvent(NULL, false, false, NULL);
01566       m_RecvDataLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01567       m_RecvDataCond = CreateEvent(NULL, false, false, NULL);
01568       m_SendLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01569       m_RecvLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01570       m_AckLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01571       m_ConnectionLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
01572    #endif
01573 }
01574 
01575 void CUDT::destroySynch()
01576 {
01577    #ifndef WIN32
01578       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_SendBlockLock);
01579       pthread_cond_destroy(&m_SendBlockCond);
01580       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_RecvDataLock);
01581       pthread_cond_destroy(&m_RecvDataCond);
01582       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_SendLock);
01583       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_RecvLock);
01584       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_AckLock);
01585       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_ConnectionLock);
01586    #else
01587       CloseHandle(m_SendBlockLock);
01588       CloseHandle(m_SendBlockCond);
01589       CloseHandle(m_RecvDataLock);
01590       CloseHandle(m_RecvDataCond);
01591       CloseHandle(m_SendLock);
01592       CloseHandle(m_RecvLock);
01593       CloseHandle(m_AckLock);
01594       CloseHandle(m_ConnectionLock);
01595    #endif
01596 }
01597 
01598 void CUDT::releaseSynch()
01599 {
01600    #ifndef WIN32
01601       // wake up user calls
01602       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01603       pthread_cond_signal(&m_SendBlockCond);
01604       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01605 
01606       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendLock);
01607       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendLock);
01608 
01609       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01610       pthread_cond_signal(&m_RecvDataCond);
01611       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01612 
01613       pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvLock);
01614       pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvLock);
01615    #else
01616       SetEvent(m_SendBlockCond);
01617       WaitForSingleObject(m_SendLock, INFINITE);
01618       ReleaseMutex(m_SendLock);
01619       SetEvent(m_RecvDataCond);
01620       WaitForSingleObject(m_RecvLock, INFINITE);
01621       ReleaseMutex(m_RecvLock);
01622    #endif
01623 }
01624 
01625 void CUDT::sendCtrl(const int& pkttype, void* lparam, void* rparam, const int& size)
01626 {
01627    CPacket ctrlpkt;
01628 
01629    switch (pkttype)
01630    {
01631    case 2: //010 - Acknowledgement
01632       {
01633       int32_t ack;
01634 
01635       // If there is no loss, the ACK is the current largest sequence number plus 1;
01636       // Otherwise it is the smallest sequence number in the receiver loss list.
01637       if (0 == m_pRcvLossList->getLossLength())
01638          ack = CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo);
01639       else
01640          ack = m_pRcvLossList->getFirstLostSeq();
01641 
01642       if (ack == m_iRcvLastAckAck)
01643          break;
01644 
01645       // send out a lite ACK
01646       // to save time on buffer processing and bandwidth/AS measurement, a lite ACK only feeds back an ACK number
01647       if (4 == size)
01648       {
01649          ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, &ack, size);
01650          ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01651          m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01652 
01653          break;
01654       }
01655 
01656       uint64_t currtime;
01657       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
01658 
01659       // There are new received packets to acknowledge, update related information.
01660       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, m_iRcvLastAck) > 0)
01661       {
01662          int acksize = CSeqNo::seqoff(m_iRcvLastAck, ack);
01663 
01664          m_iRcvLastAck = ack;
01665 
01666          m_pRcvBuffer->ackData(acksize);
01667 
01668          // signal a waiting "recv" call if there is any data available
01669          #ifndef WIN32
01670             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01671             if (m_bSynRecving)
01672                pthread_cond_signal(&m_RecvDataCond);
01673             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_RecvDataLock);
01674          #else
01675             if (m_bSynRecving)
01676                SetEvent(m_RecvDataCond);
01677          #endif
01678 
01679          // acknowledge any waiting epolls to read
01680          s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01681       }
01682       else if (ack == m_iRcvLastAck)
01683       {
01684          if ((currtime - m_ullLastAckTime) < ((m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency))
01685             break;
01686       }
01687       else
01688          break;
01689 
01690       // Send out the ACK only if has not been received by the sender before
01691       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(m_iRcvLastAck, m_iRcvLastAckAck) > 0)
01692       {
01693          int32_t data[6];
01694 
01695          m_iAckSeqNo = CAckNo::incack(m_iAckSeqNo);
01696          data[0] = m_iRcvLastAck;
01697          data[1] = m_iRTT;
01698          data[2] = m_iRTTVar;
01699          data[3] = m_pRcvBuffer->getAvailBufSize();
01700          // a minimum flow window of 2 is used, even if buffer is full, to break potential deadlock
01701          if (data[3] < 2)
01702             data[3] = 2;
01703 
01704          if (currtime - m_ullLastAckTime > m_ullSYNInt)
01705          {
01706             data[4] = m_pRcvTimeWindow->getPktRcvSpeed();
01707             data[5] = m_pRcvTimeWindow->getBandwidth();
01708             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, &m_iAckSeqNo, data, 24);
01709 
01710             CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullLastAckTime);
01711          }
01712          else
01713          {
01714             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, &m_iAckSeqNo, data, 16);
01715          }
01716 
01717          ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01718          m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01719 
01720          m_pACKWindow->store(m_iAckSeqNo, m_iRcvLastAck);
01721 
01722          ++ m_iSentACK;
01723          ++ m_iSentACKTotal;
01724       }
01725 
01726       break;
01727       }
01728 
01729    case 6: //110 - Acknowledgement of Acknowledgement
01730       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, lparam);
01731       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01732       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01733 
01734       break;
01735 
01736    case 3: //011 - Loss Report
01737       if (NULL != rparam)
01738       {
01739          if (1 == size)
01740          {
01741             // only 1 loss packet
01742             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, (int32_t *)rparam + 1, 4);
01743          }
01744          else
01745          {
01746             // more than 1 loss packets
01747             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, rparam, 8);
01748          }
01749 
01750          ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01751          m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01752 
01753          ++ m_iSentNAK;
01754          ++ m_iSentNAKTotal;
01755       }
01756       else if (m_pRcvLossList->getLossLength() > 0)
01757       {
01758          // this is periodically NAK report
01759 
01760          // read loss list from the local receiver loss list
01761          int32_t* data = new int32_t[m_iPayloadSize / 4];
01762          int losslen;
01763          m_pRcvLossList->getLossArray(data, losslen, m_iPayloadSize / 4, m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar);
01764 
01765          if (0 < losslen)
01766          {
01767             ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, data, losslen * 4);
01768             ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01769             m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01770 
01771             ++ m_iSentNAK;
01772             ++ m_iSentNAKTotal;
01773          }
01774 
01775          delete [] data;
01776       }
01777 
01778       break;
01779 
01780    case 4: //100 - Congestion Warning
01781       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype);
01782       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01783       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01784 
01785       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullLastWarningTime);
01786 
01787       break;
01788 
01789    case 1: //001 - Keep-alive
01790       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype);
01791       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01792       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01793  
01794       break;
01795 
01796    case 0: //000 - Handshake
01797       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, NULL, rparam, sizeof(CHandShake));
01798       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01799       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01800 
01801       break;
01802 
01803    case 5: //101 - Shutdown
01804       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype);
01805       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01806       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01807 
01808       break;
01809 
01810    case 7: //111 - Msg drop request
01811       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, lparam, rparam, 8);
01812       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01813       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01814 
01815       break;
01816 
01817    case 8: //1000 - acknowledge the peer side a special error
01818       ctrlpkt.pack(pkttype, lparam);
01819       ctrlpkt.m_iID = m_PeerID;
01820       m_pSndQueue->sendto(m_pPeerAddr, ctrlpkt);
01821 
01822       break;
01823 
01824    case 32767: //0x7FFF - Resevered for future use
01825       break;
01826 
01827    default:
01828       break;
01829    }
01830 }
01831 
01832 void CUDT::processCtrl(CPacket& ctrlpkt)
01833 {
01834    // Just heard from the peer, reset the expiration count.
01835    m_iEXPCount = 1;
01836    m_llLastRspTime = CTimer::getTime();
01837    m_ullEXPInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency + m_ullSYNInt;
01838    if (m_ullEXPInt < m_ullMinExpInt)
01839        m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
01840 
01841    if ((CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo) == m_iSndLastAck) || (2 == ctrlpkt.getType()) || (3 == ctrlpkt.getType()))
01842    {
01843       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextEXPTime);
01844       m_ullNextEXPTime += m_ullEXPInt;
01845    }
01846 
01847    switch (ctrlpkt.getType())
01848    {
01849    case 2: //010 - Acknowledgement
01850       {
01851       int32_t ack;
01852 
01853       // process a lite ACK
01854       if (4 == ctrlpkt.getLength())
01855       {
01856          ack = *(int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData;
01857          if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
01858          {
01859             m_iFlowWindowSize -= CSeqNo::seqoff(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), ack);
01860             m_iSndLastAck = ack;
01861          }
01862 
01863          break;
01864       }
01865 
01866        // read ACK seq. no.
01867       ack = ctrlpkt.getAckSeqNo();
01868 
01869       // send ACK acknowledgement
01870       // ACK2 can be much less than ACK
01871       uint64_t currtime = CTimer::getTime();
01872       if ((currtime - m_ullSndLastAck2Time > (uint64_t)m_iSYNInterval) || (ack == m_iSndLastAck2))
01873       {
01874          sendCtrl(6, &ack);
01875          m_iSndLastAck2 = ack;
01876          m_ullSndLastAck2Time = currtime;
01877       }
01878 
01879       // Got data ACK
01880       ack = *(int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData;
01881 
01882       // check the validation of the ack
01883       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) > 0)
01884       {
01885          //this should not happen: attack or bug
01886          m_bBroken = true;
01887          m_iBrokenCounter = 0;
01888          break;
01889       }
01890 
01891       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
01892       {
01893          // Update Flow Window Size, must update before and together with m_iSndLastAck
01894          m_iFlowWindowSize = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 3);
01895          m_iSndLastAck = ack;
01896       }
01897 
01898       // protect packet retransmission
01899       CGuard::enterCS(m_AckLock);
01900 
01901       int offset = CSeqNo::seqoff((int32_t&)m_iSndLastDataAck, ack);
01902       if (offset <= 0)
01903       {
01904          // discard it if it is a repeated ACK
01905          CGuard::leaveCS(m_AckLock);
01906          break;
01907       }
01908 
01909       // acknowledge the sending buffer
01910       m_pSndBuffer->ackData(offset);
01911 
01912       // record total time used for sending
01913       m_llSndDuration += currtime - m_llSndDurationCounter;
01914       m_llSndDurationTotal += currtime - m_llSndDurationCounter;
01915       m_llSndDurationCounter = currtime;
01916 
01917       // update sending variables
01918       m_iSndLastDataAck = ack;
01919       m_pSndLossList->remove(CSeqNo::decseq((int32_t&)m_iSndLastDataAck));
01920 
01921       CGuard::leaveCS(m_AckLock);
01922 
01923       #ifndef WIN32
01924          pthread_mutex_lock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01925          if (m_bSynSending)
01926             pthread_cond_signal(&m_SendBlockCond);
01927          pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_SendBlockLock);
01928       #else
01929          if (m_bSynSending)
01930             SetEvent(m_SendBlockCond);
01931       #endif
01932 
01933       // acknowledde any waiting epolls to write
01934       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
01935 
01936       // insert this socket to snd list if it is not on the list yet
01937       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this, false);
01938 
01939       // Update RTT
01940       //m_iRTT = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 1);
01941       //m_iRTTVar = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 2);
01942       int rtt = *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 1);
01943       m_iRTTVar = (m_iRTTVar * 3 + abs(rtt - m_iRTT)) >> 2;
01944       m_iRTT = (m_iRTT * 7 + rtt) >> 3;
01945 
01946       m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
01947 
01948       m_ullEXPInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency + m_ullSYNInt;
01949       if (m_ullEXPInt < m_ullMinExpInt)
01950           m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
01951 
01952       if (ctrlpkt.getLength() > 16)
01953       {
01954          // Update Estimated Bandwidth and packet delivery rate
01955          if (*((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4) > 0)
01956             m_iDeliveryRate = (m_iDeliveryRate * 7 + *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4)) >> 3;
01957 
01958          if (*((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 5) > 0)
01959             m_iBandwidth = (m_iBandwidth * 7 + *((int32_t *)ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 5)) >> 3;
01960 
01961          m_pCC->setRcvRate(m_iDeliveryRate);
01962          m_pCC->setBandwidth(m_iBandwidth);
01963       }
01964 
01965       m_pCC->onACK(ack);
01966       // update CC parameters
01967       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
01968       m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
01969 
01970       ++ m_iRecvACK;
01971       ++ m_iRecvACKTotal;
01972 
01973       break;
01974       }
01975 
01976    case 6: //110 - Acknowledgement of Acknowledgement
01977       {
01978       int32_t ack;
01979       int rtt = -1;
01980 
01981       // update RTT
01982       rtt = m_pACKWindow->acknowledge(ctrlpkt.getAckSeqNo(), ack);
01983 
01984       if (rtt <= 0)
01985          break;
01986 
01987       //if increasing delay detected...
01988       //   sendCtrl(4);
01989 
01990       // RTT EWMA
01991       m_iRTTVar = (m_iRTTVar * 3 + abs(rtt - m_iRTT)) >> 2;
01992       m_iRTT = (m_iRTT * 7 + rtt) >> 3;
01993 
01994       m_pCC->setRTT(m_iRTT);
01995 
01996       m_ullEXPInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency + m_ullSYNInt;
01997       if (m_ullEXPInt < m_ullMinExpInt)
01998           m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
01999 
02000       // update last ACK that has been received by the sender
02001       if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(ack, m_iRcvLastAckAck) > 0)
02002          m_iRcvLastAckAck = ack;
02003 
02004       break;
02005       }
02006 
02007    case 3: //011 - Loss Report
02008       {
02009       int32_t* losslist = (int32_t *)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData);
02010 
02011       m_pCC->onLoss(losslist, ctrlpkt.getLength() / 4);
02012       // update CC parameters
02013       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02014       m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02015 
02016       bool secure = true;
02017 
02018       // decode loss list message and insert loss into the sender loss list
02019       for (int i = 0, n = (int)(ctrlpkt.getLength() / 4); i < n; ++ i)
02020       {
02021          if (0 != (losslist[i] & 0x80000000))
02022          {
02023             if ((CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i] & 0x7FFFFFFF, losslist[i + 1]) > 0) || (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i + 1], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) > 0))
02024             {
02025                // seq_a must not be greater than seq_b; seq_b must not be greater than the most recent sent seq
02026                secure = false;
02027                break;
02028             }
02029 
02030             int num = 0;
02031             if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i] & 0x7FFFFFFF, const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
02032                num = m_pSndLossList->insert(losslist[i] & 0x7FFFFFFF, losslist[i + 1]);
02033             else if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i + 1], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
02034                num = m_pSndLossList->insert(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), losslist[i + 1]);
02035 
02036             m_iTraceSndLoss += num;
02037             m_iSndLossTotal += num;
02038 
02039             ++ i;
02040          }
02041          else if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck)) >= 0)
02042          {
02043             if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[i], const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)) > 0)
02044             {
02045                //seq_a must not be greater than the most recent sent seq
02046                secure = false;
02047                break;
02048             }
02049 
02050             int num = m_pSndLossList->insert(losslist[i], losslist[i]);
02051 
02052             m_iTraceSndLoss += num;
02053             m_iSndLossTotal += num;
02054          }
02055       }
02056 
02057       if (!secure)
02058       {
02059          //this should not happen: attack or bug
02060          m_bBroken = true;
02061          m_iBrokenCounter = 0;
02062          break;
02063       }
02064 
02065       // the lost packet (retransmission) should be sent out immediately
02066       m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this);
02067 
02068       ++ m_iRecvNAK;
02069       ++ m_iRecvNAKTotal;
02070 
02071       break;
02072       }
02073 
02074    case 4: //100 - Delay Warning
02075       // One way packet delay is increasing, so decrease the sending rate
02076       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)ceil(m_ullInterval * 1.125);
02077       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
02078 
02079       break;
02080 
02081    case 1: //001 - Keep-alive
02082       // The only purpose of keep-alive packet is to tell that the peer is still alive
02083       // nothing needs to be done.
02084 
02085       break;
02086 
02087    case 0: //000 - Handshake
02088       if ((((CHandShake*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData))->m_iReqType > 0) || (m_bRendezvous && (((CHandShake*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData))->m_iReqType != -2)))
02089       {
02090          // The peer side has not received the handshake message, so it keeps querying
02091          // resend the handshake packet
02092 
02093          CHandShake initdata;
02094          initdata.m_iISN = m_iISN;
02095          initdata.m_iMSS = m_iMSS;
02096          initdata.m_iFlightFlagSize = m_iFlightFlagSize;
02097          initdata.m_iReqType = (!m_bRendezvous) ? -1 : -2;
02098          initdata.m_iID = m_SocketID;
02099 
02100          char buffer[1500];
02101          int size = 1500;
02102          initdata.serialize(buffer, size);
02103          sendCtrl(0, NULL, buffer, size);
02104       }
02105 
02106       break;
02107 
02108    case 5: //101 - Shutdown
02109       m_bShutdown = true;
02110       m_bClosing = true;
02111       m_bBroken = true;
02112       m_iBrokenCounter = 60;
02113 
02114       // Signal the sender and recver if they are waiting for data.
02115       releaseSynch();
02116 
02117       CTimer::triggerEvent();
02118 
02119       break;
02120 
02121    case 7: //111 - Msg drop request
02122       m_pRcvBuffer->dropMsg(ctrlpkt.getMsgSeq());
02123       m_pRcvLossList->remove(*(int32_t*)ctrlpkt.m_pcData, *(int32_t*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4));
02124 
02125       // move forward with current recv seq no.
02126       if ((CSeqNo::seqcmp(*(int32_t*)ctrlpkt.m_pcData, CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo)) <= 0)
02127          && (CSeqNo::seqcmp(*(int32_t*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4), m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) > 0))
02128       {
02129          m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = *(int32_t*)(ctrlpkt.m_pcData + 4);
02130       }
02131 
02132       break;
02133 
02134    case 8: // 1000 - An error has happened to the peer side
02135       //int err_type = packet.getAddInfo();
02136 
02137       // currently only this error is signalled from the peer side
02138       // if recvfile() failes (e.g., due to disk fail), blcoked sendfile/send should return immediately
02139       // giving the app a chance to fix the issue
02140 
02141       m_bPeerHealth = false;
02142 
02143       break;
02144 
02145    case 32767: //0x7FFF - reserved and user defined messages
02146       m_pCC->processCustomMsg(&ctrlpkt);
02147       // update CC parameters
02148       m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02149       m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02150 
02151       break;
02152 
02153    default:
02154       break;
02155    }
02156 }
02157 
02158 int CUDT::packData(CPacket& packet, uint64_t& ts)
02159 {
02160    int payload = 0;
02161    bool probe = false;
02162 
02163    uint64_t entertime;
02164    CTimer::rdtsc(entertime);
02165 
02166    if ((0 != m_ullTargetTime) && (entertime > m_ullTargetTime))
02167       m_ullTimeDiff += entertime - m_ullTargetTime;
02168 
02169    // Loss retransmission always has higher priority.
02170    if ((packet.m_iSeqNo = m_pSndLossList->getLostSeq()) >= 0)
02171    {
02172       // protect m_iSndLastDataAck from updating by ACK processing
02173       CGuard ackguard(m_AckLock);
02174 
02175       int offset = CSeqNo::seqoff((int32_t&)m_iSndLastDataAck, packet.m_iSeqNo);
02176       if (offset < 0)
02177          return 0;
02178 
02179       int msglen;
02180 
02181       payload = m_pSndBuffer->readData(&(packet.m_pcData), offset, packet.m_iMsgNo, msglen);
02182 
02183       if (-1 == payload)
02184       {
02185          int32_t seqpair[2];
02186          seqpair[0] = packet.m_iSeqNo;
02187          seqpair[1] = CSeqNo::incseq(seqpair[0], msglen);
02188          sendCtrl(7, &packet.m_iMsgNo, seqpair, 8);
02189 
02190          // only one msg drop request is necessary
02191          m_pSndLossList->remove(seqpair[1]);
02192 
02193          // skip all dropped packets
02194          if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndCurrSeqNo), CSeqNo::incseq(seqpair[1])) < 0)
02195              m_iSndCurrSeqNo = CSeqNo::incseq(seqpair[1]);
02196 
02197          return 0;
02198       }
02199       else if (0 == payload)
02200          return 0;
02201 
02202       ++ m_iTraceRetrans;
02203       ++ m_iRetransTotal;
02204    }
02205    else
02206    {
02207       // If no loss, pack a new packet.
02208 
02209       // check congestion/flow window limit
02210       int cwnd = (m_iFlowWindowSize < (int)m_dCongestionWindow) ? m_iFlowWindowSize : (int)m_dCongestionWindow;
02211       if (cwnd >= CSeqNo::seqlen(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo)))
02212       {
02213          if (0 != (payload = m_pSndBuffer->readData(&(packet.m_pcData), packet.m_iMsgNo)))
02214          {
02215             m_iSndCurrSeqNo = CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
02216             m_pCC->setSndCurrSeqNo((int32_t&)m_iSndCurrSeqNo);
02217 
02218             packet.m_iSeqNo = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
02219 
02220             // every 16 (0xF) packets, a packet pair is sent
02221             if (0 == (packet.m_iSeqNo & 0xF))
02222                probe = true;
02223          }
02224          else
02225          {
02226             m_ullTargetTime = 0;
02227             m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
02228             ts = 0;
02229             return 0;
02230          }
02231       }
02232       else
02233       {
02234          m_ullTargetTime = 0;
02235          m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
02236          ts = 0;
02237          return 0;
02238       }
02239    }
02240 
02241    packet.m_iTimeStamp = int(CTimer::getTime() - m_StartTime);
02242    //m_pSndTimeWindow->onPktSent(packet.m_iTimeStamp);
02243 
02244    packet.m_iID = m_PeerID;
02245 
02246    m_pCC->onPktSent(&packet);
02247 
02248    ++ m_llTraceSent;
02249    ++ m_llSentTotal;
02250 
02251    if (probe)
02252    {
02253       // sends out probing packet pair
02254       ts = entertime;
02255       probe = false;
02256    }
02257    else
02258    {
02259       #ifndef NO_BUSY_WAITING
02260          ts = entertime + m_ullInterval;
02261       #else
02262          if (m_ullTimeDiff >= m_ullInterval)
02263          {
02264             ts = entertime;
02265             m_ullTimeDiff -= m_ullInterval;
02266          }
02267          else
02268          {
02269             ts = entertime + m_ullInterval - m_ullTimeDiff;
02270             m_ullTimeDiff = 0;
02271          }
02272       #endif
02273    }
02274 
02275    m_ullTargetTime = ts;
02276 
02277    packet.m_iID = m_PeerID;
02278    packet.setLength(payload);
02279 
02280    return payload;
02281 }
02282 
02283 int CUDT::processData(CUnit* unit)
02284 {
02285    CPacket& packet = unit->m_Packet;
02286 
02287    // Just heard from the peer, reset the expiration count.
02288    m_iEXPCount = 1;
02289    m_llLastRspTime = CTimer::getTime();
02290    m_ullEXPInt = (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) * m_ullCPUFrequency + m_ullSYNInt;
02291    if (m_ullEXPInt < m_ullMinExpInt)
02292        m_ullEXPInt = m_ullMinExpInt;
02293 
02294    if (CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo) == m_iSndLastAck)
02295    {
02296       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextEXPTime);
02297       if (!m_pCC->m_bUserDefinedRTO)
02298          m_ullNextEXPTime += m_ullEXPInt;
02299       else
02300          m_ullNextEXPTime += m_pCC->m_iRTO * m_ullCPUFrequency;
02301    }
02302 
02303    m_pCC->onPktReceived(&packet);
02304 
02305    ++ m_iPktCount;
02306 
02307    // update time information
02308    m_pRcvTimeWindow->onPktArrival();
02309 
02310    // check if it is probing packet pair
02311    if (0 == (packet.m_iSeqNo & 0xF))
02312       m_pRcvTimeWindow->probe1Arrival();
02313    else if (1 == (packet.m_iSeqNo & 0xF))
02314       m_pRcvTimeWindow->probe2Arrival();
02315 
02316    ++ m_llTraceRecv;
02317    ++ m_llRecvTotal;
02318 
02319    int32_t offset = CSeqNo::seqoff(m_iRcvLastAck, packet.m_iSeqNo);
02320    if ((offset < 0) || (offset >= m_pRcvBuffer->getAvailBufSize()))
02321       return -1;
02322 
02323    if (m_pRcvBuffer->addData(unit, offset) < 0)
02324       return -1;
02325 
02326    // Loss detection.
02327    if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(packet.m_iSeqNo, CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo)) > 0)
02328    {
02329       // If loss found, insert them to the receiver loss list
02330       m_pRcvLossList->insert(CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo), CSeqNo::decseq(packet.m_iSeqNo));
02331 
02332       // pack loss list for NAK
02333       int32_t lossdata[2];
02334       lossdata[0] = CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) | 0x80000000;
02335       lossdata[1] = CSeqNo::decseq(packet.m_iSeqNo);
02336 
02337       // Generate loss report immediately.
02338       sendCtrl(3, NULL, lossdata, (CSeqNo::incseq(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) == CSeqNo::decseq(packet.m_iSeqNo)) ? 1 : 2);
02339 
02340       int loss = CSeqNo::seqlen(m_iRcvCurrSeqNo, packet.m_iSeqNo) - 2;
02341       m_iTraceRcvLoss += loss;
02342       m_iRcvLossTotal += loss;
02343    }
02344 
02345    // This is not a regular fixed size packet...   
02346    //an irregular sized packet usually indicates the end of a message, so send an ACK immediately   
02347    if (packet.getLength() != m_iPayloadSize)   
02348       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextACKTime); 
02349 
02350    // Update the current largest sequence number that has been received.
02351    // Or it is a retransmitted packet, remove it from receiver loss list.
02352    if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(packet.m_iSeqNo, m_iRcvCurrSeqNo) > 0)
02353       m_iRcvCurrSeqNo = packet.m_iSeqNo;
02354    else
02355       m_pRcvLossList->remove(packet.m_iSeqNo);
02356 
02357    return 0;
02358 }
02359 
02360 int CUDT::listen(sockaddr* addr, CPacket& packet)
02361 {
02362    if (m_bClosing)
02363       return 1002;
02364 
02365    if (packet.getLength() != CHandShake::m_iContentSize)
02366       return 1004;
02367 
02368    CHandShake hs;
02369    hs.deserialize(packet.m_pcData, packet.getLength());
02370 
02371    // SYN cookie
02372    char clienthost[NI_MAXHOST];
02373    char clientport[NI_MAXSERV];
02374    getnameinfo(addr, (AF_INET == m_iVersion) ? sizeof(sockaddr_in) : sizeof(sockaddr_in6), clienthost, sizeof(clienthost), clientport, sizeof(clientport), NI_NUMERICHOST|NI_NUMERICSERV);
02375    int64_t timestamp = (CTimer::getTime() - m_StartTime) / 60000000; // secret changes every one minute
02376    char cookiestr[1024];
02377    sprintf(cookiestr, "%s:%s:%lld", clienthost, clientport, (long long int)timestamp);
02378    unsigned char cookie[16];
02379    CMD5::compute(cookiestr, cookie);
02380
