02381    if (1 == hs.m_iReqType)
02382    {
02383       hs.m_iCookie = *(int*)cookie;
02384       packet.m_iID = hs.m_iID;
02385       int size = packet.getLength();
02386       hs.serialize(packet.m_pcData, size);
02387       m_pSndQueue->sendto(addr, packet);
02388       return 0;
02389    }
02390    else
02391    {
02392       if (hs.m_iCookie != *(int*)cookie)
02393       {
02394          timestamp --;
02395          sprintf(cookiestr, "%s:%s:%lld", clienthost, clientport, (long long int)timestamp);
02396          CMD5::compute(cookiestr, cookie);
02397 
02398          if (hs.m_iCookie != *(int*)cookie)
02399             return -1;
02400       }
02401    }
02402 
02403    int32_t id = hs.m_iID;
02404 
02405    // When a peer side connects in...
02406    if ((1 == packet.getFlag()) && (0 == packet.getType()))
02407    {
02408       if ((hs.m_iVersion != m_iVersion) || (hs.m_iType != m_iSockType))
02409       {
02410          // mismatch, reject the request
02411          hs.m_iReqType = 1002;
02412          int size = CHandShake::m_iContentSize;
02413          hs.serialize(packet.m_pcData, size);
02414          packet.m_iID = id;
02415          m_pSndQueue->sendto(addr, packet);
02416       }
02417       else
02418       {
02419          int result = s_UDTUnited.newConnection(m_SocketID, addr, &hs);
02420          if (result == -1)
02421             hs.m_iReqType = 1002;
02422 
02423          // send back a response if connection failed or connection already existed
02424          // new connection response should be sent in connect()
02425          if (result != 1)
02426          {
02427             int size = CHandShake::m_iContentSize;
02428             hs.serialize(packet.m_pcData, size);
02429             packet.m_iID = id;
02430             m_pSndQueue->sendto(addr, packet);
02431          }
02432          else
02433          {
02434             // a mew connection has been created, enable epoll for read 
02435             s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02436          }
02437       }
02438    }
02439 
02440    return hs.m_iReqType;
02441 }
02442 
02443 void CUDT::checkTimers()
02444 {
02445    // update CC parameters
02446    m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02447    m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02448    //uint64_t minint = (uint64_t)(m_ullCPUFrequency * m_pSndTimeWindow->getMinPktSndInt() * 0.9);
02449    //if (m_ullInterval < minint)
02450    //   m_ullInterval = minint;
02451 
02452    uint64_t currtime;
02453    CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02454    int32_t loss = m_pRcvLossList->getFirstLostSeq();
02455 
02456    if ((currtime > m_ullNextACKTime) || ((m_pCC->m_iACKInterval > 0) && (m_pCC->m_iACKInterval <= m_iPktCount)))
02457    {
02458       // ACK timer expired or ACK interval reached
02459 
02460       sendCtrl(2);
02461       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02462       if (m_pCC->m_iACKPeriod > 0)
02463          m_ullNextACKTime = currtime + m_pCC->m_iACKPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency;
02464       else
02465          m_ullNextACKTime = currtime + m_ullACKInt;
02466 
02467       m_iPktCount = 0;
02468       m_iLightACKCount = 1;
02469    }
02470    else if (m_iSelfClockInterval * m_iLightACKCount <= m_iPktCount)
02471    {
02472       //send a "light" ACK
02473       sendCtrl(2, NULL, NULL, 4);
02474       ++ m_iLightACKCount;
02475    }
02476 
02477    if ((loss >= 0) && (currtime > m_ullNextNAKTime))
02478    {
02479       // NAK timer expired, and there is loss to be reported.
02480       sendCtrl(3);
02481 
02482       CTimer::rdtsc(currtime);
02483       m_ullNextNAKTime = currtime + m_ullNAKInt;
02484    }
02485 
02486    if (currtime > m_ullNextEXPTime)
02487    {
02488       // Haven't receive any information from the peer, is it dead?!
02489       // timeout: at least 16 expirations and must be greater than 10 seconds
02490       if ((m_iEXPCount > 16) && (CTimer::getTime() - m_llLastRspTime > 10000000))
02491       {
02492          //
02493          // Connection is broken. 
02494          // UDT does not signal any information about this instead of to stop quietly.
02495          // Apllication will detect this when it calls any UDT methods next time.
02496          //
02497          m_bClosing = true;
02498          m_bBroken = true;
02499          m_iBrokenCounter = 30;
02500 
02501          // update snd U list to remove this socket
02502          m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this);
02503 
02504          releaseSynch();
02505 
02506          // a broken socket can be "write" to learn the error
02507          s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02508 
02509          CTimer::triggerEvent();
02510 
02511          return;
02512       }
02513 
02514       // sender: Insert all the packets sent after last received acknowledgement into the sender loss list.
02515       // recver: Send out a keep-alive packet
02516       if (m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize() > 0)
02517       {
02518          if (CSeqNo::incseq(m_iSndCurrSeqNo) != m_iSndLastAck)
02519          {
02520             int32_t csn = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
02521             int num = m_pSndLossList->insert(const_cast<int32_t&>(m_iSndLastAck), csn);
02522             m_iTraceSndLoss += num;
02523             m_iSndLossTotal += num;
02524          }
02525 
02526          m_pCC->onTimeout();
02527          // update CC parameters
02528          m_ullInterval = (uint64_t)(m_pCC->m_dPktSndPeriod * m_ullCPUFrequency);
02529          m_dCongestionWindow = m_pCC->m_dCWndSize;
02530 
02531          // immediately restart transmission
02532          m_pSndQueue->m_pSndUList->update(this);
02533       }
02534       else
02535       {
02536          sendCtrl(1);
02537       }
02538 
02539       ++ m_iEXPCount;
02540       m_ullEXPInt = (m_iEXPCount * (m_iRTT + 4 * m_iRTTVar) + m_iSYNInterval) * m_ullCPUFrequency;
02541       if (m_ullEXPInt < m_iEXPCount * m_ullMinExpInt)
02542          m_ullEXPInt = m_iEXPCount * m_ullMinExpInt;
02543       CTimer::rdtsc(m_ullNextEXPTime);
02544       m_ullNextEXPTime += m_ullEXPInt;
02545    }
02546 }
02547 
02548 void CUDT::addEPoll(const int eid)
02549 {
02550    CGuard::enterCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02551    m_sPollID.insert(eid);
02552    CGuard::leaveCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02553 
02554    if (!m_bConnected || m_bBroken || m_bClosing)
02555       return;
02556 
02557    if ((UDT_STREAM == m_iSockType) && (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() > 0))
02558       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02559    else if ((UDT_DGRAM == m_iSockType) && (m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvMsgNum() > 0))
02560       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02561 
02562    if (m_iSndBufSize <= m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize())
02563       s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.enable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02564 }
02565 
02566 void CUDT::removeEPoll(const int eid)
02567 {
02568    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_read(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02569    s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.disable_write(m_SocketID, m_sPollID);
02570 
02571    CGuard::enterCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02572    m_sPollID.erase(eid);
02573    CGuard::leaveCS(s_UDTUnited.m_EPoll.m_EPollLock);
02574 }
